text:
I’m tired of seeing large corporations bailed out with taxpayer dollars while our smallest businesses just down the street are on the brink of collapse.

Yesterday, I introduced the Saving Our Street Act to create a $125 billion fund to help micro businesses—not Wall Street.

Our federal whistleblower laws to protect workers concerned about workplace COVID-19 exposure need to be a lot stronger. That’s why @RepRoKhanna & I included whistleblower protections in our Essential Workers Bill of Rights that Congress should include in its next relief bill.

I’m about to ask HHS & NIH experts about how we can meet our COVID-19 testing & treatment needs by fully using the Defense Production Act and through public manufacturing. Tune in live now. https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1YqJDEpkNXOxV

This is cronyism at its worst: A Postmaster General who has no experience delivering mail—just huge campaign contributions to Trump.

We cannot let this president exploit a horrific pandemic to privatize the Postal Service or bust postal workers' unions. https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/top-republican-fundraiser-and-trump-ally-to-be-named-postmaster-general-giving-president-new-influence-over-postal-service-officials-say/2020/05/06/25cde93c-8fd4-11ea-8df0-ee33c3f5b0d6_story.html

They are eroding our democracy and crushing our public institutions before our very eyes. https://twitter.com/jdawsey1/status/1258176318635741185 QT @jdawsey1 SCOOP: Major Trump & RNC donor Louis DeJoy is becoming postmaster general of the United States, putting a top ally of Trump in charge of an agency he has long criticized. Ahmaud Arbery was murdered for being Black.

His White assailants were allowed to roam free *for months* after lynching him. They faced no charges, no arrests. Police had video of Ahmaud’s murder the day it happened.

His family deserves justice. Our country deserves answers.

Another 3.2 million people filed for unemployment last week, bringing the total since mid-March to over 33 million. 

Washington must not abandon working people as COVID-10 cases outside New York keep rising. 

We must pass the Paycheck Security Act now.

People of color are hardest hit by this public health & economic crisis. I’m fighting for equitable testing & treatment, an Essential Workers Bill of Rights, a pause on payments, child care bailout, & much more so nobody is left behind in this recovery. https://www.bostonglobe.com/2020/05/06/nation/people-color-bearing-brunt-economic-pain-top-being-disproportionately-hit-by-coronavirus-poll-finds/
